ADRIATIC SEA.
ITALY-SOUTHEAST COAST.
VESSEL, RED HULL, ONE PERSON ON BOARD,
UNREPORTED FROM BRINDISI (40-38N 017-56E).
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A
SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS
TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 39 065 908 4527, 39 065 908 4409,
FAX: 39 06 592 2737, 39 065 908 4409,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
